english.segment1: I, I really want to get to know you. I really want to get to show you how. How I really feel. And now, another page is turning. Another day is dawning here. For everyone to see
english.segment2: And I'm on my knees. 'Cause I love you. And when you, touch my life. I've been born again. I am born again. And when you, touch my life. I've been born again. I am born again
english.segment3: I, I really want to get to know you. I really wish you'd show me how. The way it's meant to be. And please, deliver me from walking. Beyond the truth that called me here. I'm not ashamed today
english.segment4: I've been torn again, The curtain's been torn again
